channel.title: Changelog Feed
channel.description: Changes for each version of the software.

item.title: Version 1.108.36 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.108.36

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.DynamicPage: Footer handling improved
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Link: prevent default before press on mobile
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.TimePicker: fix cursor position when there is mask and no entry
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.PlanningCalendar: remove appointments not selected announcement
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.DynamicDateRange: align current week calculations
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now support the removal of horizontal and vertical layouts from object pages during adaptation
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: ValueListProvider: model value of single filter field is correctly updated when there is validation request
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: core/Element: use duck typing to check DOM element in 'closestTo'
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.DynamicDateRange: align current week calculations
  • Library: sap.ui.export
    • Type: FIX, Description: Dynamic filter Value length
  • Library: sap.ui.richtexteditor
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.richtexteditor.ToolbarWrapper: Console error removed
  • Library: sap.ui.unified
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.PlanningCalendar: remove appointments not selected announcement

item.title: Version 1.108.26 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.108.26

  • Library: sap.fe.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: The value help's type-ahead functionality now works as expected when the initial automatic focus is put on a field directly after a user created a new table row
    • Type: FIX, Description: The editFlow.editDocument method now returns a rejected promise in case of an error
  • Library: sap.fe.macros
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed an issue that occurred while navigating from a quick view to another app, where the semantic object mappings are not applied
  • Library: sap.fe.templates
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed an issue that occurred while navigating from a quick view to another app, where the semantic object mappings are not applied
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've introduced the isTrustedSource property as a security enhancement for the PDFViewer control as detailed in the API reference
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MultiInput: Escape text value when creating tokens with validator
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: Initialise event is now fired after metadata initialization

item.title: Version 1.108.28 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.108.28

  • Library: sap.fe.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: You can now override the text in the action confirmation popover when using building blocks in the flexible programming model
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Input: Prevent value DOM update when password type is used
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ObjectStatus: Status with icon and text overflows correctly now
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SearchField: Suggestions are correctly visualized
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Select: Required label fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.RadioButtonGroup: There is no error when destroying and adding radio buttons on select
  • Library: sap.tnt
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.tnt.SideNavigation: Add proper bottom margin for all navigation list items
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: ValueListProvider: correct uniqueness detection when TextArrangement is used
    • Type: FIX, Description: DateRangeType: Fixed regex after translation change
    • Type: FIX, Description: FilterBar: Press event of Go button is now correctly fired
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.analytics.AnalyticalBinding: sorting grouped columns when autoExpandMode = "Sequential"
  • Library: sap.ui.richtexteditor
    • Type: FIX, Description: RichTextEditor: Undo and Redo with keyboard do not work
  • Library: sap.ui.unified
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.Calendar: add styling for disabled calendar items
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.Calendar: adjust header buttons width

item.title: Version 1.108.34 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.108.34

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.IconTabBar: Content padding classes are applied to the header if additional class is present
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MenuButton: buttons in split mode have separate tooltips
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ObjectNumber: remove roledescription announcement
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Carousel: fix page disappearing when scrolling
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ProgressIndicator: Visual misalignment of percent value fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Fiori20Adapter: Performance issue fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.DatePicker: adjust value help icon settings
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now retain the page variant correctly during external navigation
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now enhanced the focus handling logic for non-draft apps
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartFilterBar: correct setting value of single filter field when there is validation request
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartLabel: Restore connection to SmartField
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: ResourceModel: Fix bundle reload after localizationChange
  • Library: sap.ui.export
    • Type: FIX, Description: PDF Export - Apply limit

item.title: Version 1.108.35 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.108.35

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Popover: Height calculations for scrollable contents are preserved after invalidation
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now updated the code to accommodate the changes related to the hostname in the response from the gateway
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now enhanced the method for detecting data loss to support nested app routes in My Inbox scenarios
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now enhanced the logic that allows access to the multiselection plug-in for the UI tables
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now correctly retrieve the table and prepare paging information when switching between the subobject items
    • Type: FIX, Description: We no longer consider the URL parameter, save-appvar-id, when initiating the app
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: UoM in display mode in table is rendered with correct width for chinese
    • Type: FIX, Description: BaseController: Error is no longer thrown when data is extended
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/model/resource/ResourceModel#_handleLocalizationChange: wait for resource bundle to be loaded
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/model/odata/v2/ODataListBinding: fire dataReceived event for aborted requests

item.title: Version 1.108.37 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.108.37

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MessagePage: Icon ignored from screen readers
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now adapted the usage of 'navigationFinished', the new navigation event
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartFilterBar: correct getUiState for Edm.String properties
    • Type: FIX, Description: ValueListProvider: correct description when multiple requests are send
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: renderWhitespace property is now applied when creating text controls
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/model/analytics/AnalyticalBinding#updateAnalyticalInfo: keep attribute properties in additional select

item.title: Version 1.108.38 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.108.38

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now set the correct state for the Selected property on the UploadSetItem
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Image: Inline svg rendering issue corrected
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed the truncation of timestamp issue in the feedListItem
  • Library: sap.tnt
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.tnt.SideNavigation: Add tooltip to the up and down arrow buttons
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: ControlProvider: V4 value list annotation is now prioritized over V2
    • Type: FIX, Description: ValueListProvider: The correct filter field description is now applied when multiple validation requests are submitted

item.title: Version 1.120.21 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.120.21

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Label: Revert
    • Type: FIX, Description: FCL: Restore focus same column fixed
  • Library: sap.gantt
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now retain the selection of a shape in Gantt chart irrespective of the row index
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the unused orphaned connector instances are destroyed correctly in cases where the related shapes are not visible
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now modified AggregationUtils method to avoid considering dragDropConfig as a shape aggregation of row settings
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Label: Revert
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that UploadSet does not insert or removes any item if they are bound to a model
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Label: Asteriks is visible when parent container has a set width
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ObjectStatus: Icon on Firefox is not cut now
    • Type: FIX, Description: Tables: Announce required state of columns with 'custom' label controls
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MenuButton: buttons in split mode have separate tooltips
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.IconTabBar: Content padding classes are applied to the header if additional class is present
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Select: Fixed incorrect ACC reading of required sap.m.Select
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ObjectNumber: remove roledescription announcement
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Carousel: fix page disappearing when scrolling
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ObjectStatus: adjust screen reader announcement
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Menu: properties string values are escaped when creating internal controls
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now correctly retrieve the table and prepare paging information when switching between the subobject items
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now support the removal of horizontal and vertical layouts from object pages during adaptation
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: UoM in display mode in table is rendered with correct width for chinese
    • Type: FIX, Description: BaseController: Error is no longer thrown when data is extended
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartFilterBar: Fix alignment of filter items and label cut-off in different languages
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartFilterBar: fetchVariant not removing empty filters if setFilterData is suspended
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/model/odata/v2/ODataListBinding: fire dataReceived event for aborted requests
    • Type: FIX, Description: Adjust link in sap.ui.core.MessageType documentation
  • Library: sap.ui.mdc
    • Type: FIX, Description: Tables: Announce required state of columns with 'custom' label controls
  • Library: sap.ui.table
    • Type: FIX, Description: Tables: Announce required state of columns with 'custom' label controls
  • Library: sap.ui.unified
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.Calendar: Calendar with two months in one column is displayed correctly now
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.DatesRow: render week numbers
  • Library: sap.uxap
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageHeaderContent: correct box-shadow styles

item.title: Version 1.120.24 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.120.24

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.DynamicPage: Scrollbar issue fixed
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MessagePage: Icon ignored from screen readers
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now set the correct state for the Selected property on the UploadSetItem
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Image: Inline svg rendering issue corrected
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed the truncation of timestamp issue in the feedListItem
    • Type: FIX, Description: CellSelector: RTL flag is set on initialization
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now removed the theme properties from charts while creating insights cards
    • Type: FIX, Description: Application developers can now modify the considerPresentationVariant property in designtime mode
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: ValueListProvider: The correct filter field description is now applied when multiple validation requests are submitted
    • Type: FIX, Description: FilterProvider: show all filters button is now correctly set according to the configurations
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartFilterBar: checkSearchAllowed now does not sets errors for condition type fields
    • Type: FIX, Description: In case of deep create the model create entry only expects path and properties with oData
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: CommandExecution: Log error when command not found + make destroy fail-safe
    • Type: FIX, Description: Test Starter: Support ui5:// URLs for "page"
    • Type: FIX, Description: Test Starter: Support resource-roots configuration

item.title: Version 1.120.15 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.120.15

  • Library: sap.fe.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where objects containing special characters in their names could not be deleted
    • Type: FIX, Description: The paste feature with hidden properties used as the description now works correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: The dropdown list suggested in mass edit fields with empty units and currencies now includes the value help option when available
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now correctly set the default selected item in the Mass Edit dialog when no values are available
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now correctly set the default selected item in the Mass Edit dialog
    • Type: FIX, Description: The editFlow.editDocument method now returns a rejected promise in case of an error
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that semantic object mappings are correctly applied when navigating from a DataFieldForIntentBasedNavigation using a button
  • Library: sap.fe.macros
    • Type: FIX, Description: End users can now remove the columns displaying values from navigation properties that contain currency and unit properties and add the columns back using table personalization
    • Type: FIX, Description: We’ve resolved an issue where the UI.HiddenFilter annotation was not correctly applied to the chart filter option
  • Library: sap.fe.templates
    • Type: FIX, Description: We no longer request data for actions of hidden subsections
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now correctly request the count of all visible tabs on the ListReport
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: For the object page, the subsection info object is not initialised now when the replace facet extension is used
    • Type: FIX, Description: We are now showing an error message when a file with unsupported media type is being uploaded
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ignore the url parameter 'save-appvar-id' while initialising the List Report application
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed the issue of setting the page variant dirty when switching between the variants on the analytical list page
  • Library: sap.ui.generic.app
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now added a check for nested nav property while fetching default values
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now removed the ETag validation for Preparation call

item.title: Version 1.120.16 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.120.16

  • Library: sap.fe.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue that led to the loading of the sap.insight message bundle twice
  • Library: sap.fe.macros
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now allow overflowing of object page header buttons in small screens
    • Type: FIX, Description: We’ve resolved an issue with the processing of the ODataListBinding in the Define Conditions tab
  • Library: sap.fe.navigation
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now properly handle the iAppStateHybridDeferred promise failures
  • Library: sap.fe.templates
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now allow overflowing of object page header buttons in small screens
  • Library: sap.gantt
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed an issue that caused unintended row bindings while interacting with draggable shapes in the chart
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed the issues with the dynamic update of overlays in the expanded row scenario
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: Selection event is fired only once
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ObjectMarker: focus visible in sap.ui.table.Table
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: We are now retaining the semantic date value correctly in the user defined variant on the analytical list page
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed the issue of setting the page variant dirty when switching between the variants on the list report page
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now avoid making the page variant dirty during external navigation scenarios
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed the issue with the chart selection in smart chart on the analytical list page
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed the issue with the display of column labels in Add Card to Insights preview dialog when i18n texts are used
    • Type: FIX, Description: We are mow invoking 'resumeSetFilterData' while initializing the filter bar to consider user entered filter data on the analytical list page
    • Type: FIX, Description: 412 confirmation pop up now show transient warning messages if no state warning messages are available
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: change event now provides correct value when constraints are violated
    • Type: FIX, Description: Personalization: column freeze no longer blocks settings dialog
    • Type: FIX, Description: DateRangeType: Fixed when don't have json on initialize
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.type.(Currency|Unit): use amount scale default 0 instead of currency's or unit's decimal places
    • Type: FIX, Description: Add sap-system to OData V4 service URLs

item.title: Version 1.120.20 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.120.20

  • Library: sap.gantt
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now added a delay in scrolling if horizontal lazy loading is enabled for any chart
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now suppress the call of the invalidate function on setShapeSelectionMode
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now introduced the fileSize parameter in fileSizeExceeded event of UploadSet
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.commons
    • Type: FIX, Description: We have now fixed unfurling issue for systems with different domain patterns
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now correctly handle the changes related to the hostname in the gateway response
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've improved our method to detect data loss to support nested app routes for My Inbox scenarios
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now correctly display the count on the dynamic tiles
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now enhanced the logic that allows access to the multiselection plug-in for the UI tables
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: Currency is now correctly read out when not editable
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartFilterBar: correct setting value of single filter field when there is validation request
    • Type: FIX, Description: SFBMultiComboBox now updates the model when single value is passed from In parameter
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartFilterBar: Non Mandatory ComboBox validation
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartFilterBar: validation for ComboBox
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartLabel: Restore connection to SmartField
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartFilterBar: validation for ComboBox performed on search
  • Library: sap.ui.layout
    • Type: FIX, Description: ColumnLayout: keep breakpoint classes stable on invalidation
  • Library: sap.ui.mdc
    • Type: FIX, Description: Table: Size of filter field in column menu

item.title: Version 1.120.23 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.120.23

  • Library: sap.gantt
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now provided a fix for the auto proportionate zoom issue that occurred on initial rendering of the Gantt Chart
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.TimePicker: fix cursor position when there is mask and no entry
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.commons
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed the issue of the selected TAccountItems not getting highlighted
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/model/analytics/AnalyticalBinding#updateAnalyticalInfo: keep attribute properties in additional select

item.title: Version 1.120.22 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.120.22

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Menu: menu items properties are handled correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Popover: Height calculations for scrollable contents are preserved after invalidation
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed the accessibility issue in aria-required-children within uploadCollection by changing the role 'option' to 'listitem'
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Link: prevent default before press on mobile
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.PlanningCalendar: remove appointments not selected announcement
    • Type: FIX, Description: : sap.m.Label: when the label is with percent width it works
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Fiori20Adapter: Performance issue fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Label: Ensure colon and asterisk are always displayed by using flex box
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ObjectStatus: adjust tooltip announcement
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: We’ve resolved an issue that occurred when adding additional filters to the Adapt Filter dialog in the analytical list page applications
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now support filenames with characters that aren't a part of ASCII characters
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: ValueListProvider: correct description when multiple requests are send
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: renderWhitespace property is now applied when creating text controls
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: Description is now shown on context changed
    • Type: FIX, Description: ValueListProvider: model value of single filter field is correctly updated when there is validation request
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: On items load the ComboBox now applies the already set value on specific case
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField now fires change event with opened suggestions
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: core/Element: use duck typing to check DOM element in 'closestTo'
  • Library: sap.ui.richtexteditor
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.richtexteditor.ToolbarWrapper: Console error removed
  • Library: sap.ui.unified
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.PlanningCalendar: remove appointments not selected announcement

item.title: Version 1.120.25 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.120.25

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now adapted to the chrome://flags/#pdf-oopif flag that is introduced to rectify the pdfViewer issues
    • Type: FIX, Description: core/Icon: fix keyboard support for keys "Space" and "Enter"
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.TimePicker: displayFormat is taken into account when formatting the output in 24-hour mode support
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that canceling a direct edit no longer results in being stuck in a busy state
    • Type: FIX, Description: We are now invalidating the context of the currently active subobject page during draft activation on the object page
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now resolved an issue with the display of counts on dynamic tiles when table filters are applied
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: Value is no longer cleared when binding context is changed
    • Type: FIX, Description: AnnotationHelper: UI.Hidden annotation default value
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: core/Icon: fix keyboard support for keys "Space" and "Enter"
  • Library: sap.ui.generic.app
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now support the formatting of smart fields in the function import dialog

item.title: Version 1.124.4 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.124.4

  • Library: sap.fe.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: The editFlow.editDocument method now returns a rejected promise in case of an error
    • Type: FIX, Description: Columns with a specific scale for a given unit of measure are now correctly exported
    • Type: FIX, Description: The paste feature with hidden properties used as the description now works correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: Custom filters now work correctly in the FilterBar building block
  • Library: sap.fe.macros
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now add additional field binding information for fields with TextArrangement set to TextOnly, to avoid adding a field twice when using key user adaptation
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that sort order works correctly for value help
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now correctly show the column header of line items annotated as dataFieldForAnnotations
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that MultiValueField is correctly editable in a table with the creationMode set to InlineCreationRows
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the dropdown list loads all values
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the application correctly loads the default variant with the custom operator
    • Type: FIX, Description: We’ve resolved an issue where the UI.HiddenFilter annotation was not correctly applied to the chart filter option
    • Type: FIX, Description: Columns with a specific scale for a given unit of measure are now correctly exported
    • Type: FIX, Description: Custom filters now work correctly in the FilterBar building block
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: adjust more link tab order
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now support easy filtering by allowing end users to use natural language search terms
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now handle the user entered filter during inline creation on the object page table
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now enhanced the filter option in the list report applications
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now pass the correct entity set for easy filters in the list report
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: SFBMultiComboBox now updates the model when single value is passed from In parameter
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartLabel: Restore connection to SmartField
  • Library: sap.ui.layout
    • Type: FIX, Description: ColumnLayout: keep breakpoint classes stable on invalidation

item.title: Version 1.124.5 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.124.5

  • Library: sap.fe.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with adding a filter field at runtime
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where objects containing special characters in their names could not be deleted
    • Type: FIX, Description: Custom filters now work correctly without a context path
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue within the flexible column layout that occurs when Edit is clicked for non-draft entities on the right panel
    • Type: FIX, Description: We no longer show the subsections that are dynamically invisible on the anchor bar of the object page
  • Library: sap.fe.macros
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now allow overflowing of object page header buttons in small screens
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with adding a filter field at runtime
    • Type: FIX, Description: Custom filters now work correctly without a context path
    • Type: FIX, Description: End users can now remove the columns displaying values from navigation properties that contain currency and unit properties and add the columns back using table personalization
  • Library: sap.fe.navigation
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now properly handle the iAppStateHybridDeferred promise failures
  • Library: sap.fe.templates
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now allow overflowing of object page header buttons in small screens
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with adding a filter field at runtime
    • Type: FIX, Description: We no longer request data for actions of hidden subsections
    • Type: FIX, Description: We no longer show the subsections that are dynamically invisible on the anchor bar of the object page
  • Library: sap.gantt
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now modified AggregationUtils method to avoid considering dragDropConfig as a shape aggregation of row settings
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now retain the selection of a shape in Gantt chart irrespective of the row index
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the unused orphaned connector instances are destroyed correctly in cases where the related shapes are not visible
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ViewSettingsDialog: fixed "select all" checkbox positioning
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.OverflowToolbar: Implement onfocusfail logic"
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now introduced the fileSize parameter in fileSizeExceeded event of UploadSet
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.commons
    • Type: FIX, Description: We have now fixed lengthy link unfurling URL for cloud systems.
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've added an easy filter on the list report page without enabling structural changes to the smart filter bar
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now correctly display the count on the dynamic tiles
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartFilterBar: correct layout when SmartFilterBar is used in freestyle VH Dialog
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've optimized the number of time model APIs that are invoked up on the selection or deselection of a smartMultiInput item when it is rendered as a multicombobox
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: Adjust link in sap.ui.core.MessageType documentation
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/core: handle focus properly when disabling

item.title: Version 1.124.6 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.124.6

  • Library: sap.fe.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that page navigation after a document creation works in apps using the flexible column layout
    • Type: FIX, Description: We no longer show the technical messages from the default OData V4 model in the message dialog
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that embedded BTP applications open correctly in a new browser tab when navigating from the table context menu
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that embedded BTP applications open correctly in a new browser tab when navigating from the table context menu
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now correctly merge the default export settings with the precedence settings from the manifest file for columns with overwritten export settings
  • Library: sap.fe.macros
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where the in-app state didn’t update when navigating from an external app
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the Table API works correctly with the UploadSetwithTable plugin
  • Library: sap.fe.templates
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where the in-app state didn’t update when navigating from an external app
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that UploadSet does not insert or removes any item if they are bound to a model
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Carousel: fix page disappearing when scrolling
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.IconTabBar: Content padding classes are applied to the header if additional class is present
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've improved our method to detect data loss to support nested app routes for My Inbox scenarios
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the SubSectionEntered event handler is executed only after the completion of the object page rebind
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now specify leadingProperty on p13nData for semantically connected columns on tables
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: ValueHelpDialog: remove description column if descriptionOnly or idOnly is used for the key
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartFilterBar: fetchVariant not removing empty filters if setFilterData is suspended
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/model/odata/v2/ODataListBinding: fire dataReceived event for aborted requests
  • Library: sap.ui.unified
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.Calendar: Calendar with two months in one column is displayed correctly now

item.title: Version 1.124.8 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.124.8

  • Library: sap.fe.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that an email address is correcty parsed
  • Library: sap.fe.templates
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the message popover is no longer shown in display mode for messages added using the table API addMessages
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Input: Exact match with no autocomplete behavior corrected
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Popover: Height calculations for scrollable contents are preserved after invalidation
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.commons
    • Type: FIX, Description: Now users are directed to the correct authentication flow.
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now correctly evaluate the InsertRestrictions and UpdateRestrictions while rendering the paste button on the object page table
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now removed the duplicate Adapt Filters button displayed on the analytical list pages
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: ValueListProvider: model value of single filter field is correctly updated when there is validation request
  • Library: sap.ui.richtexteditor
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.richtexteditor.ToolbarWrapper: Console error removed
  • Library: sap.uxap
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageLayout: Timing issue fixed

item.title: Version 1.124.9 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.124.9

  • Library: sap.fe.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure side effects are executed before saving a document on the object page
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with calling the InvokeAction extension of the EditFlow controller when the context parameter is an array of contexts
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue that caused the draftIndicator to appear below fields in grid tables
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that changes made in the manifest.json file when using feature toggles are not lost after navigating back and forth between apps
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with the pageReady event that occurred when a custom section included MDC tables or MDC charts
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now support more formats for startup parameter values when launching an app
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue that caused incorrect enablement of the action buttons
  • Library: sap.fe.macros
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where the checkbox selection for multi-input fields wasn't working correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now enabled the pagination feature again for all value help dropdowns
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue in the object page that occurred when the end user removed a section by adding a null check at the section layout access point
  • Library: sap.fe.navigation
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now added an error code to handle failures in the iAppStateHybridDeferred promise scenarios
  • Library: sap.fe.templates
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now display the correct label on the message button in the footer of the object page
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.TabContainer: sync customData between outer and internal controls
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.TimePicker: fix cursor position when there is mask and no entry
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: We’ve resolved an issue that occurred when adding additional filters to the Adapt Filter dialog in the analytical list page applications
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartFilterBar: variant now stores info for condition type filters having default operation
    • Type: FIX, Description: FilterProvider: show all filters button is now correctly set according to the configurations
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that for the new tokens created in SmartMultiInput, the correct context is returned
    • Type: FIX, Description: FilterBar: Order of filter items is now correct
    • Type: FIX, Description: ValueListProvider: correct description when multiple requests are send
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: renderWhitespace property is now applied when creating text controls
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: Description is now shown on context changed
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/model/analytics/AnalyticalBinding#updateAnalyticalInfo: keep attribute properties in additional select
    • Type: FIX, Description: core/Element: use duck typing to check DOM element in 'closestTo'
  • Library: sap.ui.export
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.Spredsheet - Stop condition fixed
  • Library: sap.ui.unified
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.Calendar: Legend selected is translated correctly in German

item.title: Version 1.124.7 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.124.7

  • Library: sap.fe.macros
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've increased the data load threshold to 500 values for the value help dropdown list
  • Library: sap.gantt
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now provided a fix for the auto proportionate zoom issue that occurred on initial rendering of the Gantt Chart
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: CellSelector: Return correct row contexts when grouping
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: We no longer consider the save-appvar-id url parameter while initiating the app
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now support the removal of horizontal and vertical layouts from object pages during adaptation
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now improved the logic to hide the columns in the smart table
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField now fires change event with opened suggestions
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: UoM in display mode in table is rendered with correct width for chinese
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartFilterBar: Fix alignment of filter items and label cut-off in different languages
  • Library: sap.uxap
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageLayout: lazy loading with selected SubSection

item.title: Version 1.124.11 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.124.11

  • Library: sap.suite.ui.commons
    • Type: FIX, Description: We have now fixed the issue in share functionalities
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with the table variant state not being set correctly after the application was upgraded to a new version
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now allow the considerPresentationVariant property to be modified in designtime mode
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now removed theme properties from chart while creating insights cards
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now removed the duplicate application names displayed in the list of related apps
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with the dirty page variant occurring during the external navigation for MultiView applications operating in the flexible column layout mode
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with the Share functionality in list reports by removing incorrect code related to the collaboration consumer class

item.title: Version 1.127.0 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.127.0

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.DynamicPage: Fix table overlapping
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.FlexibleColumnLayout: Invalid resize prevented
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.FlexibleColumnLayout: Cleanup move listeners on destroy
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.DynamicPage: Syncronization issue corrected
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.FlexibleColumnLayout: Resize issue with iframe content fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.DynamicPage: Correct header placement after expanded state change
  • Library: sap.fe.base
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now change the illustrated messages of tables
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now properly send `null` when clearing a nullable field
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where the custom text defined for the empty title of the object page wasn't appearing correctly
  • Library: sap.fe.core
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We no longer show the dialog of the create action if all the parameters are hidden
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now support displaying a hierarchy within a value help
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now show an illustrated message if there is no data in a chart
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now change the illustrated messages of tables
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now move nodes up and down using the context menu in tree tables
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now properly send `null` when clearing a nullable field
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We’ve now enabled the date picker with a minimum allowed date and a maximum allowed date
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We’ve now increased the loading threshold to 100 when scrolling in a non-responsive table
    • Type: FIX, Description: The paste feature with hidden properties used as the description now works correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the Share: Microsoft Teams functionality works correctly in our building blocks
    • Type: FIX, Description: Columns with a specific scale for a given unit of measure are now correctly exported
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where fields were not shown if a maximum annotation or a minimum annotation was used but no date annotation was used in validation
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that back navigation works correctly with high latency networks
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now show all the information messages that are sent as part of the back-end response for an action
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the condensed mode of the grid table works correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: We’ve resolved an issue where a generic error message was shown after a successful action with warnings for non-strict handling
    • Type: FIX, Description: We no longer show error messages from the default values function for the action parameter dialog
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now prevent multiple clicks on an action button for an intent-based navigation
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've improved our documentation for the controller extensions
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that semantic object mappings are correctly applied when navigating from a DataFieldForIntentBasedNavigation
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that side effects work correctly when the manifest setting for the object page uses a contextPath parameter
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where the custom text defined for the empty title of the object page wasn't appearing correctly
  • Library: sap.fe.macros
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now support displaying a hierarchy within a value help
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now show an illustrated message if there is no data in a chart
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now change the illustrated messages of tables
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Tables in the analytical list page now provide a Show Details link for subtotals with various units
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now move nodes up and down using the context menu in tree tables
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now show an illustrated message if there is no data in a table
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now properly send `null` when clearing a nullable field
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We’ve now enabled the date picker with a minimum allowed date and a maximum allowed date
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We’ve now increased the loading threshold to 100 when scrolling in a non-responsive table
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now exclude columns that use 1:n navigation from table exports
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the Share: Microsoft Teams functionality works correctly in our building blocks
    • Type: FIX, Description: Columns with a specific scale for a given unit of measure are now correctly exported
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where fields were not shown if a maximum annotation or a minimum annotation was used but no date annotation was used in validation
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the bindingInfo path of the chart is correct on the object page
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that list report tables work correctly even after a new filter is added using the Adapt Filters dialog
    • Type: FIX, Description: Selection mode now works correctly in a list report with multi-entity sets
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the conditions can be selected correctly in the value help.
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now reset table personalization when the app is relaunched after refreshing
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the grouping header for Boolean properties is correctly formatted
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now prevent multiple clicks on an action button for an intent-based navigation
    • Type: FIX, Description: We’ve resolved an issue where design-time changes caused errors on overview pages
    • Type: FIX, Description: The MessageButton now only displays validation errors for controls outside of a table that have validation errors and back-end errors
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that extended semantic date operators work correctly after the app is reloaded
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that screen readers correctly read out the information of micro charts
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that screen readers correctly read out the information of popup dialogs
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now avoid duplicate GET requests when a user clicks the Go button in the filter bar of a value help dialog
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where the custom text defined for the empty title of the object page wasn't appearing correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that unselected quick filter counts are correctly updated when an object page is open in flexible column layout mode
  • Library: sap.fe.templates
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now show an illustrated message if there is no data in a chart
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Tables in the analytical list page now provide a Show Details link for subtotals with various units
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now show an illustrated message if there is no data in a table
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now properly send `null` when clearing a nullable field
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We’ve now enabled the date picker with a minimum allowed date and a maximum allowed date
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where fields were not shown if a maximum annotation or a minimum annotation was used but no date annotation was used in validation
    • Type: FIX, Description: The message strip of the list report is now recreated when the list report is reopened after going to the home page
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the bindingInfo path of the chart is correct on the object page
    • Type: FIX, Description: Selection mode now works correctly in a list report with multi-entity sets
    • Type: FIX, Description: Design-time cards can now be shared correctly using SAP Collaboration Manager
    • Type: FIX, Description: The MessageButton now only displays validation errors for controls outside of a table that have validation errors and back-end errors

    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ndc:After closing the dialog, the focus will return to button.

item.title: Version 1.127.1 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.127.1

  • Library: sap.fe.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with adding a filter field at runtime
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where objects containing special characters in their names could not be deleted
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue within the flexible column layout that occurs when Edit is clicked for non-draft entities on the right panel
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the override execution of the onPageReady method is reverted from AfterAsync to After
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue that prevented the Delete button from triggering any deletion from an object page without a header's title
    • Type: FIX, Description: The editFlow.editDocument method now returns a rejected promise in case of an error
  • Library: sap.fe.macros
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with adding a filter field at runtime
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now merge the subsection title with the collection facet if the section title is empty
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the application correctly loads the default variant with the custom operator
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now correctly show the column header of line items annotated as dataFieldForAnnotations
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the dropdown list loads all values
  • Library: sap.fe.templates
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with adding a filter field at runtime
    • Type: FIX, Description: We no longer request data for actions of hidden subsections
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the override execution of the onPageReady method is reverted from AfterAsync to After
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue that prevented the Delete button from triggering any deletion from an object page without a header's title
  • Library: sap.gantt
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now modified AggregationUtils method to avoid considering dragDropConfig as a shape aggregation of row settings
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now retain the selection of a shape in Gantt chart irrespective of the row index
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the unused orphaned connector instances are destroyed correctly in cases where the related shapes are not visible
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.IconTabBar: Content padding classes are applied to the header if additional class is present
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ViewSettingsDialog: fixed "select all" checkbox positioning
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Page: Fix failing tests
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: ValueHelpDialog: remove description column if descriptionOnly or idOnly is used for the key
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartLabel: restore connection to SmartField reverted
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: The field value is now removed
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartFilterBar: fetchVariant not removing empty filters if setFilterData is suspended
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/model/odata/v2/ODataListBinding: fire dataReceived event for aborted requests
  • Library: sap.ui.layout
    • Type: FIX, Description: ColumnLayout: keep breakpoint classes stable on invalidation
  • Library: sap.ui.unified
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.Calendar: Calendar with two months in one column is displayed correctly now

item.title: Version 1.127.2 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.127.2

  • Library: sap.fe.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the Go button is also triggered when users navigate back to the app
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that embedded BTP applications open correctly in a new browser tab when navigating from the table context menu
  • Library: sap.fe.macros
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the requestAtLeast properties are included in the table export
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the field change event name remains consistent with the public API
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with adding a filter to a filter bar variant.
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the Table API works correctly with the UploadSetwithTable plugin
  • Library: sap.fe.templates
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with adding a filter to a filter bar variant.
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: CellSelector: Return correct row contexts when grouping
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField now fires change event with opened suggestions

item.title: Version 1.127.3 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.127.3

  • Library: sap.fe.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the navigate function cannot be retriggered if it has already been called
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that an email address is correcty parsed
    • Type: FIX, Description: FieldControl annotation in action parameter dialog now works as expected for edm.paths
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the custom operator in the FilterBar building block is loaded when the app starts
  • Library: sap.fe.macros
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with the columns referencing navigation properties that don't have a property type
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with value help columns referencing navigation properties with text annotations
    • Type: FIX, Description: FieldControl annotation in action parameter dialog now works as expected for edm.paths
    • Type: FIX, Description: The table export now works correctly after a create action
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the custom operator in the FilterBar building block is loaded when the app starts
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've increased the data load threshold to 500 values for the value help dropdown list
  • Library: sap.fe.templates
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the custom operator in the FilterBar building block is loaded when the app starts
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now removed the no data description for cases where uploadEnabled is set to false
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed the minimum height issue for the no data page in uploadSet control
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Popover: Height calculations for scrollable contents are preserved after invalidation
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.TabContainer: sync customData between outer and internal controls
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.TimePicker: fix cursor position when there is mask and no entry
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed the issue of truncating characters in the GenericTile header section by removing the usage of sap.m.Text deprecated method
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Input: Exact match with no autocomplete behavior corrected
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've improved our method to detect data loss to support nested app routes for My Inbox scenarios
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now support the removal of horizontal and vertical layouts from object pages during adaptation
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: ValueListProvider: correct description when multiple requests are send
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: renderWhitespace property is now applied when creating text controls
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: Description is now shown on context changed
    • Type: FIX, Description: ValueHelpDialog: add in ignoredFields description only if the key column is in ValueList
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: core/Element: use duck typing to check DOM element in 'closestTo'
  • Library: sap.ui.richtexteditor
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.richtexteditor.ToolbarWrapper: Console error removed

item.title: Version 1.127.4 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.127.4

  • Library: sap.fe.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now request the entity properties for a bound action configured with a returned entity type
  • Library: sap.fe.macros
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now enabled the pagination feature again for all value help dropdowns
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where the Chart building block didn't load in extension fragments
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now correctly evaluate the InsertRestrictions and UpdateRestrictions while rendering the paste button on the object page table
    • Type: FIX, Description: We’ve resolved an issue that occurred when adding additional filters to the Adapt Filter dialog in the analytical list page applications
  • Library: sap.ui.comp

    • Type: FIX, Description: FilterBar: Order of filter items is now correct
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/model/analytics/AnalyticalBinding#updateAnalyticalInfo: keep attribute properties in additional select
  • Library: sap.ui.generic.app
    • Type: FIX, Description: We no longer pass the empty function import parameters to the backend

item.title: Version 1.127.6 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.127.6

    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that back navigation works correctly when an SAP Fiori elements-based application is embedded in another application

item.title: Version 1.127.5 Changes

Changes in Version 1.127.5

item.title: Version 1.127.7 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.127.7

    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with the dirty page variant occurring during the external navigation for MultiView applications operating in the flexible column layout mode

item.title: Version 1.128.0 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.128.0

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.f.CardBase: Introduced CardBadgeCustomData
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.f.FlexibleColumnLayout: New layoutData introduced
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.f.FlexibleColumnLayout: Support aria-valuenow attribute
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.SidePanel: icon with empty src is not rendered in the expanded side content
  • Library: sap.fe.core
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now show a generic message when the item deletion fails in various scenarios
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now support Core.AlternateKeys to allow app developers to force the fetching of alternate properties when loading an object page
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We've now increased the default column size in forms for medium and large size screens
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now show a generic delete failure message only if multiple contexts have been selected for deletion
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where objects containing special characters in their names could not be deleted
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue within the flexible column layout that occurs when Edit is clicked for non-draft entities on the right panel
    • Type: FIX, Description: The editFlow.editDocument method now returns a rejected promise in case of an error
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the override execution of the onPageReady method is reverted from AfterAsync to After
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue that prevented the Delete button from triggering any deletion from an object page without a header's title
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where a navigation to an empty draft entity was triggered just after the creation of a new entity
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've improved our documentation for the controller extensions
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the Share: Microsoft Teams functionality works correctly in our building blocks
    • Type: FIX, Description: Wrapping the content of custom columns now works correctly when exporting
    • Type: FIX, Description: The paste feature with hidden properties used as the description now works correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where fields were not shown if a maximum annotation or a minimum annotation was used but no date annotation was used in validation
    • Type: FIX, Description: Columns with a specific scale for a given unit of measure are now correctly exported
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with the outbound navigation for a contained entity
    • Type: FIX, Description: Custom filters now work correctly in the FilterBar building block
  • Library: sap.fe.macros
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: The main navigation and additional links in a quick view now provide implicit semantic object mapping
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now support Core.AlternateKeys to allow app developers to force the fetching of alternate properties when loading an object page
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We've now increased the default column size in forms for medium and large size screens
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the table shown in a value help is correctly destroyed when the value help dialog is closed
    • Type: FIX, Description: End users can now remove the columns displaying values from navigation properties that contain currency and unit properties and add the columns back using table personalization
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the header of building block columns is properly cached in the table personalization
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the header level for titles in the quick view is set correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now allow overflowing of object page header buttons in small screens
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the field change event name remains consistent with the public API
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now correctly show the column header of line items annotated as dataFieldForAnnotations
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that sort order works correctly for value help
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the dropdown list loads all values
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that screen readers inform users when an upload file is mandatory
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now improved the documentation for properties of the Column building block
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that a link in the FileWrapper also wraps long filenames with no spaces
    • Type: FIX, Description: The mass edit functionality now works correctly when the SideEffects annotation contains an asterisk
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the Share: Microsoft Teams functionality works correctly in our building blocks
    • Type: FIX, Description: The enableFullScreen option now also works correctly on tables outside of an object page
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now correctly display the titles of form containers and form action toolbars when sending information to a section
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where fields were not shown if a maximum annotation or a minimum annotation was used but no date annotation was used in validation
    • Type: FIX, Description: We no longer request the field description if the table is refreshed using the mass edit functionality
    • Type: FIX, Description: We’ve resolved an issue where the UI.HiddenFilter annotation was not correctly applied to the chart filter option
    • Type: FIX, Description: You can now clear the field values of non-string fields using the mass edit dialog
    • Type: FIX, Description: Columns with a specific scale for a given unit of measure are now correctly exported
    • Type: FIX, Description: Custom filters now work correctly in the FilterBar building block
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure links of email addresses aren’t truncated when the screen is resized
    • Type: FIX, Description: We’ve resolved an issue where the default message strip for a draft-enabled app was incorrectly displayed on the chart of an app that was not draft-enabled
  • Library: sap.fe.templates
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now show a generic message when the item deletion fails in various scenarios
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now support Core.AlternateKeys to allow app developers to force the fetching of alternate properties when loading an object page
    • Type: FIX, Description: We no longer request data for actions of hidden subsections
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now allow overflowing of object page header buttons in small screens
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now provided a detailed description of the setAsSectionTitleOwner ExtensionAPI
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue that prevented the Delete button from triggering any deletion from an object page without a header's title
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where fields were not shown if a maximum annotation or a minimum annotation was used but no date annotation was used in validation
    • Type: FIX, Description: The message strip of the list report is now recreated when the list report is reopened after going to the home page
  • Library: sap.gantt
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We've now provided an original JQuery event as a parameter in shapePress and shapeContextMenu event of Gantt
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now ensure that the shape selection is retained while clicking on an empty space with the CTRL key, if ShapeSelectionMode is either MultiWithKeyboard or MultiWithKeyboardAndLasso
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now suppress the call of the invalidate function on setShapeSelectionMode
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now provided certain documentation updates for print changes
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.PlanningCalendar and SinglePlanningCalendar: Adding the ability to repeat non-working periods
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.Toolbar: Keyboard arrow navigation added
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We've now introduced the fileSize parameter in fileSizeExceeded event of UploadSet
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: CellSelector: Allow selection with Row/RowOnly
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.Dialog: Increase resize handle size
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.Popover: Increase resize handle size
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now ensure that as per the guidelines the line-height on the linkTileContents has been set to 1.5rem
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.PlanningCalendar: Drag and drop in Hours view is now with 15 minutes minimum step
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.Link: Add icon and endIcon functionality
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: CellSelector: Shift + Click now extends the selection
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Popover: Revert some of resize handle size changes
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Popover: Improve overflow handling when there is scrollable content
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ObjectNumber: adjust testing page
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.PlanningCalendarLegend: adjust accessibility semantics
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: adjust accessibility semantics
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now removed the no data description for cases where uploadEnabled is set to false
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MessageView: Correct group headers aria attributes and count
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ObjectIdentifier: adjust internal title press handling
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Popover: Height calculations for scrollable contents are preserved after invalidation
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MessageView: Fix failing qUNit test
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Link: adjust display in a form
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.PlanningCalendar: remove appointments not selected announcement
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Link: links with empty href attribute work correctly now
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Fiori20Adapter: Performance issue fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ObjectStatus: default alternative text is set for icon only statuses which icons can't be found in the Icon Registry
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Page: Fix failing tests
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Popover: modal popover is not auto closed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ObjectNumber: ARIA in empty mode is correct now
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.IconTabBar: Text only filter line-height is fixed for Hindi
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MessageView: Update details page on model update
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Menu, sap.ui.unified.Menu: added defaultClass to the items aggregation
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the height of the Selection Details popover can be adjusted without the use of custom code
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: fix SR announcements when all-day appointments are selected with keyboard.
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ObjectStatus: Icon only status has a tooltip if the provided icon / image has default one
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Button: Accessible Improvement for Button test page
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MenuButton: Accessible Improvement for MenuButton test page
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SelectDialog,TableSelectDialog: Ensure that selection count is announced after title
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now added space between attributes and the action buttons in the ActionTile
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: adjust more link tab order
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now updated the tab reading order for the FeedListItem control
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.DateTimeInput: Remove an accessibility test page
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.commons
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now added zoom level labels to the zoom action buttons
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now replaced the page title with a popover title, for better accessibility, in calculationBuilder
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed the accessibility issue in the calculation builder where the element was not getting selected upon pressing the space bar
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed the contact popup issue
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.microchart
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now ensure that the Chinese language characters don't overlap with the bar in ComparisonMicroChart
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed the duplicate announcement issue for microchart in sap.m.Table
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: SortController: enhance sort handling in case of Initial Data
    • Type: FIX, Description: SortController: enhance sort handling in case of Initial Data
    • Type: FIX, Description: TestLibrary: remove smartlink/internal/Actions
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartFilterValues: validation for Edm.Int data types with 0 as value is now correct
    • Type: FIX, Description: AnnotationHelper: UI.Hidden annotation default value
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField with upper case annotation stays busy
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartForm: Semantically connected elements now have correct ariaLabelledBy
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: Regression after composite binding fix for fiscal fields
    • Type: FIX, Description: FilterBar: Mandatory fields visibility is now correctly updated
    • Type: FIX, Description: FilterProvider: filled filter data for numeric filters is correct
    • Type: FIX, Description: SFBMultiComboBox now updates the model when single value is passed from In parameter
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: Only CompositeType can be used as type for composite bindings error fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: Old description in display mode when value is deleted
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartLabel: Restore connection to SmartField
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartLabel: restore connection to SmartField reverted

  • Library: sap.ui.core
