item.title: Version 1.129.0 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.129.0

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Label: Revert
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.SidePanel: fixed resizing when Side Panel is left-positioned
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.SidePanel: fixed side content closing on mobile device
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.Card: Header now has correct height when only toolbar is set
    • Type: FIX, Description: Integration cards: List 'info' is now correctly displayed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.DynamicPage: Fix Popover scroll in sample
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.DynamicPage: Fix pin button visibility
  • Library: sap.fe.base
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now use the DoNotCheckScaleOfMeasuredQuantity annotation to skip validating decimal digits in a unit-specific scale
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the items included in the FileWrapper are treated as one control by screen readers
  • Library: sap.fe.core
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now show an illustrated message if there is no data in a table
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We've now enabled the handling of side effects for custom form elements specified in the manifest
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now support additional formats for date and time-based controls
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now support key user adaptation for actions
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now define whether a link opens in a new tab or window, or in the same frame, the parent frame, or the full window of the same tab.
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now use the DoNotCheckScaleOfMeasuredQuantity annotation to skip validating decimal digits in a unit-specific scale
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now check the parameter type only if there is a parameter value present in the startup parameters or default values
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now correctly read Boolean parameters that have no value when triggering an action
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now display the correct message when an action is triggered for multiple rows in isolated mode and the message target is in the action parameter dialog
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the Adapt Filters button works correctly with the FilterBar building block
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that page navigation after a document creation works in apps using the flexible column layout
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the UI.ExcludeFromNavigationContext annotation works properly even when a value is set for the Exclude property in the filter bar
    • Type: FIX, Description: The message popover for tables now displays information about multiple columns and columns that have been hidden using table personalization
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now show the label from the manifest or annotations in the Adapt Filters dialog
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that embedded BTP applications open correctly in a new browser tab when navigating from the table context menu
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue that led to the loading of the sap.insight message bundle twice
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the Edit button works correctly on a subobject page in sticky mode
    • Type: FIX, Description: You can now paste data into the ReadyOnly columns of a table
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now consider the value type when parsing default values in startup parameters
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now show a generic delete failure message only if multiple contexts have been selected for deletion
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with adding a filter field at runtime
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where objects containing special characters in their names could not be deleted
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the header form of the object page coming from a navigation property works correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: Custom filters now work correctly without a context path
  • Library: sap.fe.macros
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now show an illustrated message if there is no data in a table
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now show an illustrated message when no data is available in a chart
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now support the table copy in all value help dialogs
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We've now enabled the handling of side effects for custom form elements specified in the manifest
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now support additional formats for date and time-based controls
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now support key user adaptation for actions
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now define whether a link opens in a new tab or window, or in the same frame, the parent frame, or the full window of the same tab.
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've increased the data load threshold to 500 values for the value help dropdown list
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the Adapt Filters button works correctly with the FilterBar building block
    • Type: FIX, Description: End users can now use the up and down arrow keys to select options in the Editing Status filter
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where the checkbox selection for multi-input fields wasn't working correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with the columns referencing navigation properties that don't have a property type
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with adding a filter to a filter bar variant.
    • Type: FIX, Description: The message popover for tables now displays information about multiple columns and columns that have been hidden using table personalization
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now show the label from the manifest or annotations in the Adapt Filters dialog
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now consider the sort order for custom data from SortRestriction of value help, if it isn't included in the presentation variant
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where the in-app state didn’t update when navigating from an external app
    • Type: FIX, Description: The table export now works correctly after a create action
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the Table API works correctly with the UploadSetwithTable plugin

    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with value help columns referencing navigation properties with text annotations
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now display an appropriate message after changes are saved in the mass edit dialog
    • Type: FIX, Description: The main navigation and additional links in a quick view now provide implicit semantic object mapping when a dynamic semantic object is used
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now correctly wrap the header text in the ObjectStatus control if it is longer than the available screen width
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the items included in the FileWrapper are treated as one control by screen readers
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that screen readers correctly read out the information of empty fields with a quick view
    • Type: FIX, Description: Visual filters now work correctly if the aggregatable property is hidden
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now merge the subsection title with the collection facet if the section title is empty
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with adding a filter field at runtime
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure the correct size of DataPoints is used in the object page header
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now correctly align the Datapoint in the object page header
    • Type: FIX, Description: Custom filters now work correctly without a context path
  • Library: sap.fe.navigation

    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now show an illustrated message if there is no data in a table

    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now support key user adaptation for actions

    • Type: FIX, Description: You can now paste data into the ReadyOnly columns of a table
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with adding a filter field at runtime

    • Type: FIX, Description: CellSelector: Return correct row contexts when grouping

    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Carousel: Empty page message resizes correctly in vertical direction

    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.NavContainer: Unstable test

    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: navigate to correct month in islamic calendar
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Link: prevent default before press for mobile safari
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Label: Asteriks is visible when parent container has a set width
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now removed sap-desktop attribute to provide consistent focus across all devices
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: add today announcement for the grid cell

    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Button: prevent press on right click

    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ObjectStatus: Icon on Firefox is not cut now
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.TimePicker: align the placeholder reference with other inputs
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ObjectIdentifier: Accessible Improvement for ObjectIdentifier test page

    • Type: FIX, Description: SinglePlanningCalendar: Change in the z-index of the header
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.StepInput: The valueStateText is given priority.
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ViewSettingsDialog: fixed "select all" checkbox positioning
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Popover: Revert some of resize handle size changes
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MenuButton: buttons in split mode have separate tooltips
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ColorPalettePopover: synch selected color with inner palette
    • Type: FIX, Description: Integration cards: List 'info' is now correctly displayed
    • Type: FIX, Description: We ensure that the UploadSetwithTable plugin now uses currentContexts for file preview
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.PlanningCalendar: Proper positioning of a non-work period.
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the content maintained within the GenericTile does not extended beyond the control

    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Menu: properties string values are escaped when creating internal controls
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MessageBox: Added missing documentation
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.QuickView: Title and description wrap correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.TimePicker: set default width
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now display the Copy to Clipboard button in tables even when the selection mode is NONE
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Adaptation project now supports modification of the application-level settings in the SAP delivered apps
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: The action buttons in the object page header now have borders
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Support Collaboration Manager for H2H Chat
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now prevent the inline row creation when the table's item binding is obsolete to avoid activation issues
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now resolved an issue with the adaption of section tabs in an object page
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now consider the nonInsertable property for Paste scenarios
    • Type: FIX, Description: You now use the Esc key to close the Contact Details popover
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now correctly retrieve the table and prepare paging information when switching between the subobject items
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now resolved an issue where columns with semantically connected fields didn't appear in the exported file
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the Insights cards show the correct criticality
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now support filenames with Unicode characters
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that an error message is displayed when a user navigates to the object page through a table in flexible column layout mode
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now support filenames with characters that aren't a part of ASCII characters
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now improved the performance of the sharing design time cards using SAP Collaboration Manager
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now support the removal of horizontal and vertical layouts from object pages during adaptation
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now adjust the section titles in the message popover when they are hidden in the content area
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now improved the logic to hide the columns in the smart table
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now set the ShellTitle correctly in the Save as Tile dialog for analytical list page applications

    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: UoM in display mode in table is rendered with correct width for chinese
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartFilterBar: Fix alignment of filter items and label cut-off in different languages

    • Type: FIX, Description: ValueHelpDialog: remove description column if descriptionOnly or idOnly is used for the key
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartFilterBar: fetchVariant not removing empty filters if setFilterData is suspended
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: The field value is now removed
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartFilterBar: conversion for Edm.Int data types with 0 as value is now correct
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/model/odata/v2/ODataListBinding: fire dataReceived event for aborted requests
    • Type: FIX, Description: Samples failing tests fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/model/DataState.js: consider also the control dirty state of the parent data state
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/core/format/NumberFormat: allow parsing empty string for Currencies and Units if showNumber is false
    • Type: FIX, Description: core.Icon sample - ensure style.css is loaded
  • Library: sap.ui.documentation
    • Type: FIX, Description: Demo Kit: Fix query parameter only for documentation
    • Type: FIX, Description: Demo Kit: Change info fixed
  • Library: sap.ui.fl
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.ui.fl.write.api.FieldExtensibility: Adds information about relevant business objects to the extension data.
  • Library: sap.ui.generic.app
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now support the formatting of smart fields in the function import dialog
    • Type: FIX, Description: We no longer pass the empty function import parameters to the backend
  • Library: sap.ui.integration
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Integration cards: ComboBoxFilter now has selectedIndex option
    • Type: FIX, Description: Integration cards: List 'info' is now correctly displayed
  • Library: sap.ui.mdc

    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.rta: Remove "Hidden" object mutation in context based toolbar model

item.title: Version 1.129.1 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.129.1

  • Library: sap.fe.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that applications open correctly in SAP Build Work Zone

item.title: Version 1.130.0 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.130.0

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Integration Cards: Add fitType property for icons in Header and Object Card content
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Integration Cards: New pagination experience
    • Type: FIX, Description: Integration Cards: Adjust Badge creation
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.DynamicPageTitle: Fix focus lost on actions
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.CardBadgeCustomData: CardBadgeVisibilityMode is added to type descriptor
  • Library: sap.fe.core
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now support the sorting of data in micro charts
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now add additional custom fields to the top of the mass edit dialog
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now use the context menu to create a new object in the tree table
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now use the createDocument API to create a document using the Table building block
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now support key user adaptation on the mass edit dialog
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We’ve added SAP Collaboration Manager as a further option to the “Share” menu
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now define a custom “save” logic for the Mass Edit dialog using the extensionAPI
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now provide a dialog enabling users to directly create a new object in a list report without triggering a navigation to the object page afterwards
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now support "Pattern" as a format option for date-and-time-based controls
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the analytical table supports the contextdefiningproperties annotation
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue that caused incorrect enablement of the action buttons
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now enable the selection of table rows when the Copy to Clipboard button is visible
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that applications open correctly in SAP Build Work Zone
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now properly translate the editing status column on the table personalization
    • Type: FIX, Description: We no longer consider the text annotation on a groupable property if the target property of the text is non-groupable for analytical tables
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where the Delete action on a table didn't function correctly after navigating away and returning to the object page
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the navigate function cannot be retriggered if it has already been called
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now check the parameter type only if there is a parameter value present in the startup parameters or default values
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the correct metamodel is passed to the removeSensitive data function
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now correctly read Boolean parameters that have no value when triggering an action
  • Library: sap.fe.macros
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now support the runtime instantiation of the Chart building block
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now support the sorting of data in micro charts
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now add additional custom fields to the top of the mass edit dialog
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Key users can now make changes to the manifest.json file
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now ensure that the default format for date values in a table is HH:MM
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now use the context menu to create a new object in the tree table
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now use the createDocument API to create a document using the Table building block
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now support key user adaptation on the mass edit dialog
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We’ve added SAP Collaboration Manager as a further option to the “Share” menu
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now define a custom “save” logic for the Mass Edit dialog using the extensionAPI
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now provide a dialog enabling users to directly create a new object in a list report without triggering a navigation to the object page afterwards
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now support "Pattern" as a format option for date-and-time-based controls
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the analytical table supports the contextdefiningproperties annotation
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that back-end errors in the upload table are always displayed
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where the Chart building block didn't load in extension fragments
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with the action parameter dialog where the type-ahead popup opens automatically when the focus is on the first field
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that back-end errors in the upload table are always displayed
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where the parameter dialog could not be used with empty multi-input fields
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now enabled the pagination feature again for all value help dropdowns
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now correctly format the group header in a table when no context is available
    • Type: FIX, Description: We’ve removed the error message that appeared when a user pasted data from a spreadsheet into a table on the object page
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where the filters applied on the insights cards weren't reflecting when the end user navigated back to the app.
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where the quick view popover showed no data for an analytical table used in the list report
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now enable the selection of table rows when the Copy to Clipboard button is visible
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the selected file format is correctly shown in the error dialog when an incorrect media type is uploaded
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now properly translate the editing status column on the table personalization
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now consider the ParameterDefaultValue annotation when triggering the setOperationDefaultValues function
    • Type: FIX, Description: We’ve resolved an issue where labels were duplicated in the sort section of the table personalization dialog for navigation properties where TextArrangement is set to TextOnly
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've increased the data load threshold to 500 values for the value help dropdown list
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the correct metamodel is passed to the removeSensitive data function
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the ResultIsActiveEntity property is not taken into account when triggering the setOperationDefaultValues function
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've increased the data load threshold to 200 values for the value help dropdown list
  • Library: sap.fe.templates
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now support the sorting of data in micro charts
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Key users can now make changes to the manifest.json file
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now provide a dialog enabling users to directly create a new object in a list report without triggering a navigation to the object page afterwards
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now enable the selection of table rows when the Copy to Clipboard button is visible
    • Type: FIX, Description: We no longer show the title of the editable header when it’s empty
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the onRestore hook is triggered in the controller if the refreshStrategyOnAppRestore property has been defined in the manifest
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.f.CalendarInCard: Now allows 12 hour format of appointment time
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.DynamicDateRange: Add new options
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.Carousel: On touch devices navigation arrows are always visible
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: CellSelector: Provide selection change event
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Menu: menu items properties are handled correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Input: Correct value restoration after backspace
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.TabContainer: sync customData between outer and internal controls
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now removed sap.m.upload.UploadSetwithTable deprecated control along with its files and folders from the repository, since it was introduced as an experimental control
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.TabContainer: doesn't show scroll bar if not needed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.DynamicDateRange: translations are now correclty applied
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Slider, sap.m.RangeSlider: Documentation update
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Input: Exact match with no autocomplete behavior corrected
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the correct list item is selected when the setSelectedItemById API is used
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the Upload button has a left margin same as other buttons in the table action row
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now updated the filetypeMismatch event to send the correct filetype or mimetype
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ObjectStatus: update documentation regarding wrapping behavior of the control
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MessageView: invalidate details page before navigation
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.RatingIndicator: Display only compact indicator fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: : sap.m.Label: when the label is with percent width it works
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the UploadEnabled property setting enables or disables drag and drop that is attached from the plugin
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: add week announcement to grid cells
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ObjectStatus: new CSS class for languages with higher line heights
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Dialog: Prevent null within area resize observer deregistration
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed the issue of truncating characters in the GenericTile header section by removing the usage of sap.m.Text deprecated method
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Label: Ensure colon and asterisk are always displayed by using flex box
    • Type: FIX, Description: Demo Kit: Icon explorer scroll fixed
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now ensure that UI5 tooling supports the changes made to the manifest file in the adaptation projects
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now support AI-Assisted error resolution feature in the object pages for a beta release
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now support the handling of 503 error responses
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with the visibility of the Paste button on tables in the object pages
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that navigation works correctly when the Edm.DateTime fields are present in an object page
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with adding more filters from the Adapt Filters dialog in the analytical list page applications
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now added an invisible text as the label for the multi-view dropdown menu in the single table mode for accessibility
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that side effects work properly when fields with intent-based links are present on the object pages
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: SmartFilterBar: DateRange support new options
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: SmartField: Supports lazy loading of function import parameters value help metadata
    • Type: FIX, Description: ValueListProvider: correct description when multiple requests are send
    • Type: FIX, Description: ValueHelpDialog: add in ignoredFields description only if the key column is in ValueList
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: renderWhitespace property is now applied when creating text controls
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: Description is now shown on context changed
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: FunctionImport field with wrong value list restriction
    • Type: FIX, Description: ValueListProvider: model value of single filter field is correctly updated when there is validation request
    • Type: FIX, Description: ValueListProvider: type ahead no longer throws exception
    • Type: FIX, Description: ValueHelpDialog: Add button in header now has correct announcement
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: On items load the ComboBox now applies the already set value on specific case
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField now fires change event with opened suggestions
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: FESR: Enhance FESR to enable reporting of integration env
    • Type: FIX, Description: core/Element: use duck typing to check DOM element in 'closestTo'
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/core/cldr/*.json: fix translations for sap-calendarWeek.narrow and .wide
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.core.format.NumberFormat#format: CLDR data for currencies is considered correctly without currency customizing
    • Type: FIX, Description: dom/findTabbable: return when meet the scope element twice
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.odata.v4.lib._AggregationCache: use undefined instead of null for dimensions or aggregates not present in a row
  • Library: sap.ui.fl

  • Library: sap.ui.generic.app
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the smart filter fields in the function import dialog support the TextArrangement annotation
  • Library: sap.ui.integration
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.f.CalendarInCard: Now allows 12 hour format of appointment time

    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Integration Cards: request method now supports FormData
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Integration Cards: Add fitType property for icons in Header and Object Card content

  • Library: sap.ui.richtexteditor

  • Library: sap.ui.unified

  • Library: sap.ui.vk
    • Type: FIX, Description: Set RTE min-height to 0

  • Library: sap.ushell
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Content Finder (DT): Introduce catalogs
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: FLP Dialog: Implement New UI Design
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Content Finder (DT): Introduce catalogs
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Appearance settings in launchpad

    • Type: FIX, Description: FLP About Dialog: Fixing About Dialog
    • Type: FIX, Description: SAPIT - pass app parameters to ui5appwz special html launched
    • Type: FIX, Description: FESR appEvent causes exception

item.title: Version 1.130.1 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.130.1

  • Library: sap.fe.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: In InlineCreationRows mode, we now correctly highlight newly created rows in a table
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure the correct selection mode is set in all tables
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue that caused the draftIndicator to appear below fields in grid tables
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that changes made in the manifest.json file when using feature toggles are not lost after navigating back and forth between apps
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that if all the selection buttons for intent-based navigation within a menu are hidden, the menu button is also hidden
    • Type: FIX, Description: You can now override the text in the action confirmation popover for a specific action and entity set
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now support defining a field with value help by using a specific property of the singleton entity
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now support the creation of a new entity using the NewAction annotation
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the copy action enablement considers the OperationAvailable annotation
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now request the entity properties for a bound action configured with a returned entity type
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now support more formats for startup parameter values when launching an app
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue that caused a crash after saving when the WebSocket annotation was used for side-effect configuration
  • Library: sap.fe.macros
    • Type: FIX, Description: In InlineCreationRows mode, we now correctly highlight newly created rows in a table
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure the correct selection mode is set in all tables
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now check for the first field that is visible on the action parameter dialog and correctly focus on it
    • Type: FIX, Description: You can now override the text in the action confirmation popover for a specific action and entity set
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now support defining a field with value help by using a specific property of the singleton entity
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where charts configured with a relative metaPath and contextPath didn't load
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the copy action enablement considers the OperationAvailable annotation
  • Library: sap.fe.templates
    • Type: FIX, Description: In InlineCreationRows mode, we now correctly highlight newly created rows in a table
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure the correct selection mode is set in all tables
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that if all the selection buttons for intent-based navigation within a menu are hidden, the menu button is also hidden
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ObjectStatus: icon only link is now clickable
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: adjust grid cell description
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.PlanningCalendarLegend: adjust accessibility semantics
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.commons
    • Type: FIX, Description: We have now fixed the issue in share functionalities
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartVariantManagementModel: updateView take care of standard variant
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that for the new tokens created in SmartMultiInput, the correct context is returned
    • Type: FIX, Description: FilterBar: Order of filter items is now correct
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: 0 value for NUMC with TextArrangement is now not shown initially
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.core.format.NumberFormat#format: Do not apply currency customizing for decimals on currency formats, if format option "style: 'long'/'short'" is set
  • Library: sap.ui.export
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.Spredsheet - Stop condition fixed
  • Library: sap.ui.unified
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.PlanningCalendarLegend: adjust accessibility semantics

item.title: Version 1.130.2 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.130.2

  • Library: sap.fe.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the messages from the back end containing braces are properly displayed on the UI
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the table selection mode works correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure side effects are executed before saving a document on the object page
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now request validation and message side effects in the same batch to improve performance
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with calling the InvokeAction extension of the EditFlow controller when the context parameter is an array of contexts
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that back navigation works correctly when an SAP Fiori elements-based application is embedded in another application
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MessagePage: Icon ignored from screen readers
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: Value is no longer cleared when binding context is changed
    • Type: FIX, Description: FilterBar: changing localization now recreates the buttons with reloaded resource buntle
    • Type: FIX, Description: ValueHelpDialog: add in ignoredFields description, only if the key column is in ValueList entity set and is visible
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartFilterBar: SFBMultiComboBox now updates the model properly on suggested item selection
    • Type: FIX, Description: ValueListProvider: The correct filter field description is now applied when multiple validation requests are submitted
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: description is now correctly handled in display mode
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartFilterBar: variant now stores info for condition type filters having default operation
    • Type: FIX, Description: FilterProvider: show all filters button is now correctly set according to the configurations
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: FESR: semanticStepName not set for interaction
  • Library: sap.uxap
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageLayout: Incorrect scrolling prevented

item.title: Version 1.130.4 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.130.4

  • Library: sap.fe.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where the sort icon in the column wasn't functioning correctly
  • Library: sap.fe.macros
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where the sort icon in the column wasn't functioning correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the application works correctly when the personalization settings of a chart are set to false
    • Type: FIX, Description: The mass edit functionality now works for fields containing a composite binding
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the RichTextEditor building block with metadata can be used with a button group aggregation
  • Library: sap.fe.templates
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where the sort icon in the column wasn't functioning correctly

item.title: Version 1.130.3 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.130.3

  • Library: sap.fe.macros
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with internationalization of field labels in the parameter dialog
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.commons
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed the issue in the timeline where it was re-rendering in its original state after removing certain filters
    • Type: FIX, Description: Cannot fetch X-CSRF token - sap.insights.CardHelper
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where the navigation wasn't working correctly with the table variants or chart variants on the analytical list page
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that side effects on the object page function correctly when link fields of the DataFieldForAnnotation type are involved
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with triggering a side effect event when modifying values in the value help fields within the table on the object page
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now made some improvements to the AI-Assisted Smart Summarization and AI-Assisted Easy Filter features

item.title: Version 1.131.1 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.131.1

  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now enabled the navigation option in the message popover even if a description or descriptionUrl is not present in the message model, in case where AI-Assisted Error Resolution is enabled
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that a token for the unit field is also added in the easy filter
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now removed theme properties from chart while creating insights cards
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now allow considerPresentationVariant property to be modified in designtime mode
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now removed the duplicate application names displayed in the list of related apps
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed the issue with of a dirty page variant occurring during the external navigation for MultiView applications operating in the fixed column layout mode

    • Type: FIX, Description: We now support the creation of a new entity using the NewAction annotation
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the copy action enablement considers the OperationAvailable annotation
  • Library: sap.fe.macros
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now use the context menu to expand or collapse a node in a tree table
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now provide a scrollThreshold setting for tables
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now support 1:N filtering in the P13n personalization dialog for tables

    • Type: FIX, Description: We now check for the first field that is visible on the action parameter dialog and correctly focus on it
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the application works correctly when the personalization settings of a chart are set to false
    • Type: FIX, Description: You can now override the text in the action confirmation popover for a specific action and entity set
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the singletonPathVisitor annotation can be used to configure the visibility of the custom action buttons in the list report page

    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We no longer show the Open in New Tab option in the context menu if the object page is set to open in edit mode
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now sort the values in columns by their unit of measure or currency first, followed by the values
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We've implemented the DataFieldForActionGroup annotation, which allows the grouping of actions and their rendering within menu buttons
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now support using an absolute path as the target entity for side effects events in a list report
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now display 10 fixed rows in a tree or analytical table on an object page by default when the table is not the sole control in the section or when the sectionLayout is set to Page
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now support 1:N filtering in the P13n personalization dialog for tables
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now specify a title for the action confirmation dialog
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now support semantic coloring for criticality at row level in table integration cards
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where the sort icon in the column wasn't functioning correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: Tree tables and analytical tables are now correctly loaded in the flexible programming model explorer
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now consider all navigation paths including the parent level navigation while creating a binding path
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with the email validation string that caused the application to become unresponsive
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now properly manage focus on the table when grouping data
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now use the correct icons for criticality, as defined in the SAP Fiori for Web Design Guidelines
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now update the BreadCrumbs link after data changes
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now set 'Multi' as the default selection mode for a tree table if the selection mode is not specified in the manifest
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the messages from the back end containing braces are properly displayed on the UI
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the table selection mode works correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the contextPath property is consistently bound to the meta model, allowing the correct context path to be generated regardless of any entity name conflicts
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved a performance issue that occurred while creating an object in collaborative draft mode
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure side effects are executed before saving a document on the object page
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now request validation and message side effects in the same batch to improve performance
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the application state is not preserved when entering and exiting the key user adaptation mode
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with calling the InvokeAction extension of the EditFlow controller when the context parameter is an array of contexts
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that back navigation works correctly when an SAP Fiori elements-based application is embedded in another application
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with handling the startup parameters for applications using the sap-keep-alive mode
    • Type: FIX, Description: In InlineCreationRows mode, we now correctly highlight newly created rows in a table
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that changes made in the manifest.json file when using feature toggles are not lost after navigating back and forth between apps
  • Library: sap.fe.macros
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We no longer show the Open in New Tab option in the context menu if the object page is set to open in edit mode
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now sort the values in columns by their unit of measure or currency first, followed by the values
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now set the rowCountMode parameter in the tree table to Auto when entering fullscreen mode
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now display 10 fixed rows in a tree or analytical table on an object page by default when the table is not the sole control in the section or when the sectionLayout is set to Page
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now set the rowCountMode parameter in the grid table to Auto when entering fullscreen mode
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now support 1:N filtering in the P13n personalization dialog for tables
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now allow an action-specific title in the action parameter dialog
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now support semantic coloring for criticality at row level in table integration cards
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We no longer show semantically connected fields if all their contents are hidden
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now provide a VariantManagement building block, and you can now use the Apply Automatically function with the FilterBar building block
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where the sort icon in the column wasn't functioning correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with value help condition propagation when there are no conditions
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now add stable identification values to each of the segmented button items in the content switcher elements on the analytical list page
    • Type: FIX, Description: The mass edit functionality now works for fields containing a composite binding
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an error that prevented the change handlers from executing for fields that are bound to a JSON model
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've removed the paginator reference from subobject pages, as it is no longer needed
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now use the correct icons for criticality, as defined in the SAP Fiori for Web Design Guidelines
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the isValid parameter of the change event is correctly set based on the MDC promise in the FieldAPI
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now set 'Multi' as the default selection mode for a tree table if the selection mode is not specified in the manifest
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the table selection mode works correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with navigation from the error message for empty but required fields
    • Type: FIX, Description: We no longer allow using the drag-and-drop functionality to move a node to a position directly adjacent to its current position
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with the IDs of actions for intent-based navigation in tables
    • Type: FIX, Description: In InlineCreationRows mode, we now correctly highlight newly created rows in a table
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the filter context URL is included in the selection variant for quick view links, allowing potentially sensitive data to be excluded
